season_standing.tie_break_rule: At the end of the group phase, in the event that two (or more) teams have an equal number of points the following rules break the tie: 1. Head-to-head 2. Goal difference 3. Goals scored During the group phase, the following tie-breaking procedures are used: 1. Goal difference 2. Goals scored
